subject: PSYCH
title: Social Psychology
description: An introduction to the scientific study of social behaviour and social influences on behaviour. Theories and research on such topics as attitude change and persuasion, stereotypes and prejudice, conformity and obedience to authority, altruism, conflict, attraction, and love may be introduced. [Note: PSYCH 253 - offered on campus and Online; PSYCH 253R - offered at Renison University College]
